#=
term_MI(py, pxt1, pxt2, pt1t2, px, pt1, pt2) = py*log((pxt1*pxt2*pt1t2)/(py*px*pt1*pt2))
IM = term_MI(0.052376, +0.134492, +0.070326, +0.143468, 0.294053, 0.315295, 0.351893)   # +1.500000 -1.000000 -1.000000

#=
term_MI(pxt, px, pt) = pxt*log(pxt/(px*pt))
IM = term_MI(0.052376, 0.294053, +0.143468)  # +1.500000 -1.000000 -1.000000
IM += term_MI(0.075699, 0.294053, +0.115281) # +1.500000 -1.000000 +0.000000
IM += term_MI(0.006417, 0.294053, +0.056546) # +1.500000 -1.000000 +1.000000
IM += term_MI(0.006370, 0.294053, +0.093178) # +1.500000 +0.000000 -1.000000
IM += term_MI(0.008105, 0.294053, +0.081555) # +1.500000 +0.000000 +0.000000
IM += term_MI(0.060800, 0.294053, +0.162788) # +1.500000 +0.000000 +1.000000
IM += term_MI(0.011580, 0.294053, +0.115246) # +1.500000 +1.000000 -1.000000

IM += term_MI(0.013819, 0.294053, +0.044926) # +1.500000 +1.000000 +1.000000
